### **Professional Practice Lead Tender Announcement**

#### Reference Number: PW-23-01021875

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a Professional Practice Lead to provide expertise, knowledge, and experience to advise the Assistant Commissioner, Health Services on professional practice matters.

#### Background

The CSC Health Services department requires a Professional Practice Lead to lead the development and implementation of professional practice in the department. This individual will be responsible for advising the Assistant Commissioner, Health Services on matters related to professional practice, including but not limited to establishing a professional practice structure, promoting professional standards, and integrating new knowledge and evidence-based practices.

#### Statement of Work

*	Provide ongoing consultation and advice to the Assistant Commissioner, Health Services on professional practice matters
*ucid also participate in meetings and briefings to provide timely information and advice
*	Review and provide recommendations on Health Services policies and guidelines
*	Visit CSC Regional Offices and Institutions as requested
*	Supply products and services per the detailed scope of work outlined in the RFP

#### Tender Terms

The CSC has determined that the nature of this procurement is competitive with unrestricted tendering. All interested suppliers may submit a bid.

The RFP has been posted on the Government of Canada's Buyandsell.gc.ca website and will remain open until February 13, 2023 at 2:00pm.

#### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on the Applicants Compliance to the RFP and the higher the technical content and overall professional experience, the better the proposal.

This is an open tendering process whereby all interested suppliers may participate. The estimated cost range of the contract is as per the RFP.

#### Contract Details

Period of the Contract: The Work is to be performed during the period of contract award to three (3) years later with the option to renew for two (2) additional one-year periods.

#### Amendments

Please ensure you have read the two (2) amendments issued to validate your responses. The dates of the amendments are January 18, 2023 and February 9, 2023.

#### Contact Information

For any questions you may have you may contact Nadine Pike at 506 378-1049 or Nadine.Pike@csc-scc.gc.ca.
